channel.title: Formula 1 news - Autosport
channel.description: Stay up to date with the latest Formula 1 news from Autosport.

item.title: F1 signs new five-year deal with Interlagos to host Sao Paulo GP
item.description: Formula 1 will remain at Interlagos for another five years after a new deal was announced on Wednesday, renaming the race the Sao Paulo Grand Prix

item.title: Who are McLaren's new Formula 1 investors?
item.description: McLaren ended a turbulent 2020 on a high on Sunday as it clinched third place in the Formula 1 constructors' championship, marking its best finish since 2012

item.title: Ricciardo: F1 should consider Abu Dhabi layout change after "grim" entertainment
item.description: Daniel Ricciardo believes Formula 1 should consider tweaking the layout of the Yas Marina Circuit in Abu Dhabi, saying the entertainment in its races can be "a bit grim"

item.title: Bottas: Second in F1 drivers’ championship "can’t be that satisfying"
item.description: Valtteri Bottas says finishing second in the Formula 1 drivers' championship "can't be that satisfying" following another defeat in the title race to Mercedes team-mate Lewis Hamilton

item.title: Red Bull hopeful of keeping Honda F1 power units after engine freeze talks
item.description: Red Bull says alignment among rival teams over a Formula 1 engine freeze has made it hopeful it can still secure a deal to keep running Honda engines from 2022

item.title: Brown: Third in F1 constructors' standings more about prestige than money
item.description: McLaren Formula 1 team chairman Zak Brown insists that the team's jump to third place in the world championship is more about prestige than any financial benefit

item.title: Vettel explains Ferrari farewell song in Abu Dhabi GP
item.description: Sebastian Vettel has explained why he burst in to song for his Ferrari Formula 1 team after the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix

item.title: New lighting system to open up possibilities for more F1 night races
item.description: An all-new lighting system revealed for the first time today could open the door for more night races to be added to the Formula 1 calendar

item.title: Yuki Tsunoda replaces Kvyat at AlphaTauri for 2021 F1 season
item.description: The AlphaTauri Formula 1 team has confirmed Yuki Tsunoda will partner Pierre Gasly in 2021, replacing Daniil Kvyat at Red Bull's sister team

item.title: Mazepin loses court battle over failed attempt to buy Force India
item.description: The case brought by Dmitry Mazepin's company Uralkali against the administrators of the Force India Formula 1 team in the High Court in London has been dismissed

item.title: Ilott named as Ferrari F1 test driver for 2021
item.description: Callum Ilott has been confirmed as Ferrari's Formula 1 test driver for next season, after finishing as Formula 2 runner-up to Mick Schumacher this year

item.title: Sir Frank Williams in stable condition after being admitted to hospital
item.description: Sir Frank Williams has been admitted to hospital, and is in a stable condition, the former Formula 1 team principal's family has confirmed

item.title: Alonso: F1 Abu Dhabi young driver test ignited "competitive spirit"
item.description: Fernando Alonso says his run in the Formula 1 young driver test in Abu Dhabi has ignited his "competitive spirit" ahead of his return with Alpine in 2021

item.title: Masi explains decision to delay Sainz investigation in Abu Dhabi GP
item.description: Formula 1 race director Michael Masi has explained the decision to delay the stewards' investigation into Carlos Sainz Jr's alleged slow pitlane entry in Abu Dhabi

item.title: Alonso fastest in F1 Abu Dhabi young driver test for Renault
item.description: Double world champion Fernando Alonso topped the times at Formula 1's young driver test in Abu Dhabi on Tuesday, as he completed a full day of running for Renault
